shortdesc.ph: Stops the audio device loopback test.
Stops the audio device loopback test.
Stops the audio device loopback test.

ul.li: This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method is only available to hosts.
After calling , you must call this method to stop the audio device loopback test.
This method is only applicable to Windows and macOS.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
Only the host role is allowed to call this method.
After calling , you must call this method to stop the audio device loopback test.
This method is only available on Windows and macOS.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
Only the host role can call this method.
After calling , you must call this method to stop the loopback test.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and troubleshooting.
